Title: DAYOFWEEK()
Description: Return the weekday index of the argument

Returns the weekday index for date
          (1 = Sunday, 2 = Monday,
          …, 7 = Saturday). These index values
          correspond to the ODBC standard. Returns
          NULL if date is
          NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT DAYOFWEEK('2007-02-03');
        -> 7
